dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.pageDesc: System overview and quick access to your resources
dashboard.noActivityData: No activity data in the past 12 hours

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.noTasksDescription: Enter a task description to start your first task
tasks.inputPlaceholder: Describe the task you want to execute...
tasks.aiTitleToggle: Use haiku to generate readable titles
tasks.taskNotExist: Task does not exist or has been deleted
tasks.enterContinueContent: Enter content to continue the conversation...

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.noRecipesDescription: Use frago recipe create to create a new recipe
recipes.workflowTip: Chain multiple steps to automate complex tasks
recipes.atomicTip: Small recipe that solves one specific problem, composable
recipes.name: Name

console.title: Console
console.devConsoleDesc: This console is designed for creating and testing Frago recipes. Claude will execute tasks automatically without requiring manual approval for each tool call.
console.autoApproveWarningDesc: All tool calls (file operations, shell commands, etc.) will be executed without confirmation. Use with caution on sensitive projects.
console.interactiveMode: For interactive mode with manual approval, use Claude Code directly:

sync.title: Sync
sync.description: Sync your frago resources across devices
sync.pageDesc: Sync your frago resources across devices

secrets.title: Secrets
secrets.description: Manage your API keys and secrets
secrets.pageDesc: Manage environment variables for recipes and integrations
secrets.securityNotice: Your secrets are stored locally on this device and never leave your machine. They are accessed only by recipes you run â€” frago does not manage or transmit them. By default, secrets are excluded from sync even if you have configured a private repository.
secrets.name: Name
secrets.envVarsNotConfigured: The following environment variables are used by recipes but not yet configured:
secrets.noEnvVars: No environment variables yet. Click "Add" to create one.
secrets.varNameHint: Can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and cannot start with a number
secrets.varNameInvalid: Variable name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and cannot start with a number
secrets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete environment variable {{name}}?

general.title: General Configuration
general.confirmSwitchDesc: This will remove your custom API configuration
general.confirmSwitchFullDesc: Switching to official Claude API will clear your current custom endpoint configuration (including API Key). This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
general.leaveEmptyDefault: Leave empty to use preset default
general.leaveEmptySonnet: Leave empty to use sonnet model

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.showSystemStatusDesc: Display CPU and memory usage in status bar
appearance.exitConfirmationDesc: Show confirmation dialog when closing window
appearance.autoScrollOutputDesc: Automatically scroll to bottom when new content appears

init.systemDepsDesc: frago requires Node.js and Claude Code to function properly.
init.skipWarning: Some features may not work without all dependencies installed.
init.resDesc: Install Claude Code commands, skills, and example recipes.
init.readyToUse: frago is ready to use. Click the button below to finish setup.
init.reviewSummary: Review the setup summary below before finishing.
init.stepsSkippedDesc: You can still complete setup, but some features may not work correctly until all steps are completed. You can access these settings anytime from the Settings page.
init.authDesc: Configure how Claude Code authenticates with Anthropic or a third-party API.
init.officialAuthDesc: Use Anthropic's official authentication. You manage your own Claude login. This is the default and recommended option for most users.
init.customEndpointDesc: Connect to a third-party API endpoint (DeepSeek, Aliyun, Kimi, etc.) with your own API key. Configure this in Settings after setup.
init.skipAuthCheckbox: I'll configure authentication later in Settings
init.authNote: You can change authentication settings anytime from the Settings page. If using official authentication, make sure to log in to Claude Code via terminal first.
init.compDesc: You're all set to start using frago

errors.customEndpointModelRequired: Custom endpoint requires a main model name
